title: Swarn Kamal Pendant - 22K Gold Lakshmi Kasu Necklace Accent
materials: Ruby Cabochon. Exquisite Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This handcrafted pendant features a central Lakshmi motif, meticulously crafted in 22K gold. The Lakshmi is surrounded by brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia stones that add a captivating sparkle. A Ruby cabochon is set inside the swan motif adding an auspicious touch. The openwork design is inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry, showcasing intricate filigree detailing.
colors: Predominantly gold with the white sparkle of Cubic Zirconia
highlighted by the red of the ruby cabochon.
occasions: Perfect as an auspicious addition to a wedding haaram
or for daily wear. Ideal for festivals like Diwali and Ugadi.
description: This pendant combines the timeless elegance of traditional South Indian design with a modern aesthetic. The use of high-quality materials ensures durability, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees a radiant luster. This pendant makes a meaningful and stylish addition to any jewelry collection, representing prosperity and grace.
